channel.title: FM: Trouble in CoI - Canned - (0/16)
channel.description:
# [color=orange]Trouble in CoI FM[/color] :tada: ###### hosted by Boss110 and @Kirefitten
## [color=orange]Rules[/color] :policeman: [Standard Forum rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515) Don't angleshoot Don't be a salty boi Don't post in big text Respect other player!
## [color=orange]Story[/color] :cat: ### @everylitten GUYS THEY ARE TRAITOR IN DISCORD RIGHT NOW HELP Council Of Idiots, know for being one of the most useless ever council that exit for worship litten, riot, **make questionable mafia setup**, the place where all litten kind live peacefully and sometimes even play game, however... that peace won't last for so long
## [color=orange]Gameplay[/color] :video_game: Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me in class card DM Scum Faction will talk through a private discord server When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it ## [color=orange]Special Stuff[/color] :gem: All class card is hidden and most of them base on CoI, FoL community There are no convert ability There are no fool/jester like class Close set-up with a lot of power role No Citizen! ## [color=orange]Feedback[/color] :loudspeaker: 1: You sleep peacefully 2: You were attack and die! 3: You were unable to ___ 4: You ability was success 5: You are bleeding/poison and will die in ___ night! 6: Investigate result 7: Other result **You will not be told if someone save you from attack** **You will not be told about redirect, you will get number 4 result as long it success**
### [color=orange]Executions[/color] :crossed_swords: To accuse someone say “**/accuse [player]**” or “**/vote [player]**” Once majority is reached to accuse someone, a trial will begin. Either after 24 hours or once a trial reaches majority on pardon/execute, the trial will end. Executions end the Day ### [color=orange]Rolelist[/color] :clipboard: [color=orange]11 Random[/color] [color=red]4 Traitor[/color] [color=purple]1 Unknow???[/color] ### [color=orange]Journal/Log[/color] :page_facing_up: Message me your entire journal/log, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed, **deathnote are allow** ### [color=red]Ready for madness?[/color] :smiling_imp: To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like “I want to join” or “/join” or “/in” or “sign me up, mighty litten” or whatever you want
### [color=orange]Player list[/color] :mens: 1. NozBugz - Dead D1 ([[color=red]**Solic**[/color]](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-trouble-in-coi-day-1-choo-choo-16-16/72251/685?u=boss110)) 2. Sam17z 3. PoisonedSquid - Dead N1 ([[color=orange]**CoI member**[/color]](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-trouble-in-coi-day-2-its-not-peaceful-at-all-11-16/72251/930?u=boss110)) 4. overthebin 5. GamerPoke - [color=orange]Fluffy litten[/color] :cat: 6. MaximusPrime 7. Luxy - Dead N1 ([[color=red]**Popplio disquised as a litten**[/color]](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-trouble-in-coi-day-2-its-not-peaceful-at-all-11-16/72251/930?u=boss110)) 8. Margaret 9. HTM - Dead N1 ([[color=orange]**Litten Bot**[/color]](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-trouble-in-coi-day-2-its-not-peaceful-at-all-11-16/72251/930?u=boss110)) 10. Pug - Dead N1 ([[color=orange]**Necromancer Pug**[/color]](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-trouble-in-coi-day-2-its-not-peaceful-at-all-11-16/72251/930?u=boss110)) 11. PKR 12. Soulshade55r 13. Eevee 14. Damafaud 15. Solic 16. Marluxion
### [color=orange]Link[/color] :paperclip: **[Start of day one](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-trouble-in-coi-day-1-riot-16-16/72251/40?u=boss110)** [Gamerpoke is litten?!?!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-trouble-in-coi-day-1-riot-16-16/72251/277?u=boss110) [Luxy is litten too](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-trouble-in-coi-day-1-litten-is-innocent-cat-16-16/72251/290?u=boss110) [Noz Suicide](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-trouble-in-coi-day-1-choo-choo-16-16/72251/685?u=boss110) **[Start of night one](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-trouble-in-coi-night-1-beware-the-popplio-15-16/72251/920?u=boss110)** **[Start of day two](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-trouble-in-coi-day-2-its-not-peaceful-at-all-11-16/72251/930?u=boss110)** ### [color=orange]Backup[/color] :male_detective:
1. Hippo ALT (:thinking:)

item.title: FM: Trouble in CoI - Canned - (0/16)
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Firekitten:

@Solic ngl you made me very sad assuming we will make that Town sided of a setup with merc

Well it is not THAT town-sided hypothetically with the neutral still being aligned to a neutral evil as well. There were definitely more things that were frustating for me and that was just one for me during this game.

I tried to keep an open mind about the setup early on, but other things just kept on adding to the salt.

Read full topic
